channel.title: I-580 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in I-580 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue east on I-80 for Elko.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 36A and 36B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exits 36A and 36B. Exit 36A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 36B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). I-580 ends at I-80. The freeway continues as US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exit 33
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 33 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. A distance marker showing the next three Reno exits is on the left side of the picture. The next three exits are: Plumb Lane, Mill St., and E. Second St. Use the Plumb Lane exit for the Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 32
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 32 - Moana Lane.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Reno Exits
item.description: Reno - Next 12 Exits on I-580/US-395 North.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 24 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 24
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 24 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway.

item.title: I-580 North Approaching Exit 24
item.description: I-580 North approaching Exit 2. Use Exit 24 for N. Lake Tahoe and Virginia City

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Reno
item.description: I-580/US-395 North - Reno, on overpass of Exit 16.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 16
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 16 - Old US 395. Use Exit 16 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 12
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 10 - Bellevue Road.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 10
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 10 - Eastlake Blvd. This is the southern terminus of Alt. US-395. Alt. US-395 was created when the new I-580 freeway was completed. Alt. US-395 follows the old route of US-395 to Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Washoe County Line
item.description: Washoe County Line on I-580/US-395 North.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 5
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 5 - US-50 East/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 North for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp. Use left lane for Carson City Downtown; left lane for US-50 east to Dayton and Fallon.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here. The I-580 shield is not listed on the overhead.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 38
item.description: I-580 north at Exit 38 - Fairview Drive.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East - Carson City
item.description: First shields on I-580 north in Carson City.

item.title: I-580/US-50/US-395 Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-580 North/US-50 East/US-395 North Freeway Entrance in Carson City. This is the southern beginning of I-580.

item.title: US-395 North at US-50/I-580 - Carson City
item.description: US-395 North at US-50/I-580 in Carson City. Turn left for US-50 West/South Lake Tahoe. Continue straight for Bus. US-395/S. Carson St. Merge right for I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East/Fallon/Reno.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-580/US-50
item.description: US-395 North approaching I-580/US-50 in Carson City. Merge right for I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East/Fallon/Reno. I-580 begins here at the US-50/US-395 junction.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching US-50 and I-580
item.description: US-395 North approaching US-50 and I-580 in Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp. Use left lane for Carson City Downtown; left lane for US-50 east to Dayton and Fallon.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 68A and 68B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). This is the north end of I-580.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 68A and 68B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). I-580 ends at I-80. The freeway continues as US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exits 68AB and 69
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 68A - I-80 East; Exit 68B - I-80 West, and Exit 69 (exit number not shown) - Oddie Blvd.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 67
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 67 - E. Second St./Glendale Ave.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 66 and 67
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 66 - Mill St. Approaching Exit 67 - E. Second St.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exit 65
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 65 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. A distance marker showing the next three Reno exits is on the left side of the picture. The next three exits are: Plumb Lane, Mill St., and E. Second St. Use the Plumb Lane exit for the Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 64
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 64 - Moana Lane.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 62
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 62 - Neil Road/Meadowood Mall Way.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Reno Exits
item.description: Reno - Next 12 Exits on I-580/US-395 North.

item.title: NV-431 East at US-395
item.description: NV-431 east at I-580/US-395. For I-580/US-395 north to Reno continue straight. Merge right for I-580/US-395 south to Carson City and South Lake Tahoe.

item.title: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South Freeway Entrance
item.description: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South Freeway Entrance.

item.title: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South
item.description: NV-431 East at I-580/US-395 South to South Lake Tahoe and Carson City.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 56 Offramp
item.description: I-580/US-395 North on Exit 56 Offramp. Turn right for NV-431 East (via NV-341) to Virginia City. Turn left for NV-431 West to North Lake Tahoe.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 56
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 56 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - N. Lake Tahoe/Virginia City
item.description: I-580/US-395 North - Use Exit 56 for N. Lake Tahoe and Virginia City (via NV-341).

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 56
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 56 - NV-431/Mount Rose Highway.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-580/US-395 North. Distance to Reno, Susanville (CA), and Alturas (CA).

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Reno
item.description: I-580/US-395 North - Reno, on overpass of Exit 50.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 50
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 50 - Old US 395. Use Exit 50 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 50
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 50 - Old US 395. Use Exit 50 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 46
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exit 46 - Bellevue Road.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 46
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 46 - Bellevue Road.

item.title: I-580 North/US-395 North - Washoe County
item.description: I-580 North/US-395 North in Washoe County.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 44
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 44 - Alt. US-395 North/Eastlake Blvd. Alt. US-395 north was created when the new I-580 freeway was completed. Alt. US-395 follows the old route of US-395 to Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Washoe County Line
item.description: Washoe County Line on I-580/US-395 North.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-580/US-395 North. Distance to Reno, Susanville (CA), and Alturas (CA).

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 44
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 44 - Alt. US-395 North/Eastlake Blvd.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 43
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 43 - Arrowhead Drive. This is the northern end of the Carson City business loop.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 41
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 41 - College Parkway.

item.title: US-395 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here. I-580 begins here northbound, although it is not listed on the overhead. The first I-580 shield is north of this interchange.

item.title: I-580 East - Exit 7
item.description: I-580 east approaching Exit 7 - To I-80 East/Richmond Parkway/Point Richmond.

item.title: I-580 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-580 east at Exit 2 - San Quentin/Last Marin County Exit. Access to the San Quentin State Prison. This is the last exit before the Richmond Bridge over San Pablo Bay.

item.title: I-580 East
item.description: I-580 east shield.

item.title: I-580 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-580 East at Exit 1 - Bellam Blvd/Francisco Blvd. I-580 continues east towards the Richmond Bridge and Oakland. The Richmond Bridge can be seen in the background.

item.title: I-580 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-580 east approaching Exit 1 - Bellam Blvd./Francisco Blvd. Due to road construction the right lane is an exit only lane for Exit 1.

item.title: US-101 South - Exits 451B and 451A
item.description: US-101 south at Exit 451B - I-580/Richmond Bridge/Oakland. Approaching Exit 451A - Andersen Drive/Francisco Blvd. This is the western end of I-580.

item.title: US-101 South - Exits 451B and 451A
item.description: US-101 south at Exit 451B - I-580/Richmond Bridge/Oakland. Approaching Exit 451A - Andersen Drive/Francisco Blvd. US-101 continues south towards San Francisco.

item.title: I-680 North - Exit 30B
item.description: I-680 north at Exit 30B - I-580 West/Oakland

item.title: I-680 North - Exit 30A and Exit 30B
item.description: I-680 north at Exit 30A - I-580 East/Livermore/Stockton. Approaching Exit 30B - I-580 West/Dublin/Oakland. Continue on I-680 north to Sacramento.

item.title: I-680 North - Approaching Exit 30A and Exit 30B
item.description: I-680 north at Exit 30A - I-580 East/Stockton approaching Exit 30B - I-580 West/Oakland.

item.title: I-680 North Approaching Exit 30A and Exit 30B
item.description: I-680 north approaching Exit 30A - I-580 East/Stockton and Exit 30B - I-580 West/Oakland.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 8B
item.description: I-80 east at the I-580/I-80 split (Exit 8B). Use I-580 for Download Oakland/Hayward-Stockton. Use I-880 for Alameda/San Jose. I-80 traffic turns towards the Bay Bridge.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue east on I-80 for Elko.

item.title: I-80 East Approaching Exit 15
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue east on I-80 for Elko.

item.title: I-80 East - Reno/Sparks Exits
item.description: Next 3 Reno/Sparks exits on I-80 East: Wells Ave., I-580/US-395, Prater Way.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 15
item.description: Connection from I-80 west to I-580/US-395. Use the right lane for US-395 north to Susanville (California). Use left lane for I-580/US-395 south to Carson City.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue on I-80 west for Sacramento (California).

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 16 and 15
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 16 - Prater Way/E. 4th St. Approaching Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue west on I-80 towards Sacramento (California).

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker for next three Sparks/Reno area exits on I-80 west. Distance to Prater Way, US-395/I-580, Wells Ave.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker for next three Sparks/Reno exits on I-80 west: Rock Blvd., Prater Way, and US-395/I-580.
